name: The World According to Jen & Carolyn

episodes.title: I Can Smell Your Cult
episodes.description: So, you think you’re too “smart” to ever join a cult? Maybe you are and maybe, just maybe, if the messaging were right and the leader was charismatic enough you’d drop everything and move to a commune in the desert! Join Jen and Carolyn as we break down the reasons why people join cults (which has nothing to do with intelligence) and what makes so many cult leaders so damn charismatic. We'll also discuss how ideas that start off as beautiful and inclusive can end in something as horrific as the mass suicide/murder of close to 900 people. 6 of the Most Infamous Cults in HistoryHow Do Normal, Successful, and Smart People End Up Joining a Cult?What Is a Cult? 10 Warning SignsHow to identify a cult: Six tips from an expert - CBS NewsAre Cults Legal? - HG.org14 Characteristics of A Cult Leader-Psyc MechanicsThe True Story of Brainwashing and How it Shaped AmericaWhat is Cognitive DissonanceFestinger, L.
